title: Drawing, "Two silver plates", 1725–50
medium: Graphite, pen, ink, brush, gray water color
markings: Watermark: Two-pointed anchor in ovoid, above six-pointed star.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Round plates, one side with a curved moulded rim.  Written in ink, in the upper left corner: "Io Angelo Spirazzi mi obligo/ di fare li tondini di questa stessa misura."  Other side:  with a round molded rim.  The section is indicated.  Written in ink, in the left edge, vertically:  "onci 19 l'uno."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two silver plates", 1725–50.
1725–50. Graphite, pen, ink, brush, gray water color. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6002.
